mapper.select: select c.code_key as codeKey, c.code_name as codeName, c.invalid as invalid, c.version as version from dc_code c where c.code_key=#{pk}

select cd.code_key as codeKey, cd.segment_type as segmentType, cd.option_key as optionKey, cd.seg_value as segValue, cd.length as length, cd.format as format, cd.order_no as orderNo, cd.affect_flow as affectFlow from dc_code_detail cd where cd.code_key=#{pk} order by cd.order_no
select flow_key as flowKey, code_key as codeKey, now_no as nowNo, next_no as nextNo from dc_flow f where f.flow_key=#{pk}
mapper.insert: insert into dc_flow( flow_key, code_key, now_no, next_no )values( #{flowKey}, #{codeKey}, 1, 2 )
